scripts.db:pull: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma db pull --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:dev: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma migrate dev --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma migrate status --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:deploy: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma migrate reset --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:force: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma migrate reset --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma --force
scripts.db:push: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma db push --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.web -- npx prisma db seed --schema=../core/prisma/schema.prisma
